Room.Name: Bendine Aquarium Octopus Tank
Room.ShortDescription: You have foolishly entered the dangerous Octopus Tank in the Aquarium.
Room.LongDescription: The management of the Bendine Aquarium and Marina takes no responsibility for your obviously foolish decision to enter the Octopus Tank. But since you're here, you should watch out for approaching octopi, as they attack without warning and with deadly accuracy.
